languages.text:
"Мой дар — предупрежденье и возможность:
Твоя судьба на волоске висит.
Но, проявив терпенье, осторожность,
Купец погибель в бегство обратит".

traits.locale_text:
"Мой дар — предупрежденье и возможность:
Твоя судьба на волоске висит.
Но, проявив терпенье, осторожность,
Купец погибель в бегство обратит".
traits.speaker: Zanni

languages.text:
"Both opening and warning is my boon,
Your fate hangs by a thread drawn breaking tight,
But with a show of patience opportune,
The Merchant certain death will turn to flight."
languages.original_text:
"Мой дар — предупрежденье и возможность:
Твоя судьба на волоске висит.
Но, проявив терпенье, осторожность,
Купец погибель в бегство обратит".

traits.locale_text:
"Both opening and warning is my boon,
Your fate hangs by a thread drawn breaking tight,
But with a show of patience opportune,
The Merchant certain death will turn to flight."
traits.speaker: Zanni

languages.text:
“打开与警告都是我的礼物，
你的命运已经被丝线紧紧拴住。
但只要保持耐心，等待机会，
这场必死之局，终将得以脱出。”
languages.original_text:
"Both opening and warning is my boon,
Your fate hangs by a thread drawn breaking tight,
But with a show of patience opportune,
The Merchant certain death will turn to flight."

traits.locale_text:
“打开与警告都是我的礼物，
你的命运已经被丝线紧紧拴住。
但只要保持耐心，等待机会，
这场必死之局，终将得以脱出。”
traits.speaker: Zanni

languages.text:
«Represento la apertura y la advertencia.
Tu destino pende de un hilo a punto de ceder,
mas, demostrando una oportuna paciencia,
la aparente muerte segura será la salida del Mercader».
languages.original_text:
"Both opening and warning is my boon,
Your fate hangs by a thread drawn breaking tight,
But with a show of patience opportune,
The Merchant certain death will turn to flight."

traits.locale_text:
«Represento la apertura y la advertencia.
Tu destino pende de un hilo a punto de ceder,
mas, demostrando una oportuna paciencia,
la aparente muerte segura será la salida del Mercader».
traits.speaker: Zanni

languages.text:
「開幕と警告はどちらも僕の恩恵
君の運命は張り詰めた糸で吊るされており、
好機に忍耐を見せるなら、
商人の確実な死は逃亡に変わる」
languages.original_text:
"Both opening and warning is my boon,
Your fate hangs by a thread drawn breaking tight,
But with a show of patience opportune,
The Merchant certain death will turn to flight."

traits.locale_text:
「開幕と警告はどちらも僕の恩恵
君の運命は張り詰めた糸で吊るされており、
好機に忍耐を見せるなら、
商人の確実な死は逃亡に変わる」
traits.speaker: Zanni

languages.text:
"Mein Geschenk ist öffnen und ist warnen,
am sei'dnen Faden Euer Schicksal hängt.
Zur Geduld muss ich Euch wohl ermahnen,
damit das Schicksal noch die Flucht Euch schenkt."
languages.original_text:
"Both opening and warning is my boon,
Your fate hangs by a thread drawn breaking tight,
But with a show of patience opportune,
The Merchant certain death will turn to flight."

traits.locale_text:
"Mein Geschenk ist öffnen und ist warnen,
am sei'dnen Faden Euer Schicksal hängt.
Zur Geduld muss ich Euch wohl ermahnen,
damit das Schicksal noch die Flucht Euch schenkt."
traits.speaker: Zanni

languages.text:
« L'ouverture et l'alerte sont ma mission,
Et tendu est le fil qui retient votre sort.
Mais avec un peu de patience et d'attention,
{mf|Le Marchand|La Marchande} s'enfuira et éludera la mort. »
languages.original_text:
"Both opening and warning is my boon,
Your fate hangs by a thread drawn breaking tight,
But with a show of patience opportune,
The Merchant certain death will turn to flight."

traits.locale_text:

{mf|Le Marchand|La Marchande} s'enfuira et éludera la mort. »
traits.speaker: Zanni

languages.text:
"Benim lütfumdur hem gösteri hem uyarı,
Kaderin bir ipin ucundadır sıkı sıkıya bağlı.
Lakin bir sabır emaresi gösterilirse yerinde
Ölümü mutlak Tüccar'ı döndürecek firariye."
languages.original_text:
"Both opening and warning is my boon,
Your fate hangs by a thread drawn breaking tight,
But with a show of patience opportune,
The Merchant certain death will turn to flight."
